title: SciCalc: Wear calculator
summary: Scientific calculator for Android Wear watches
description: Do you need more than a simple calculator? Then swipe to the left to get a page full of scientific functions on the Fife-V Wear calculator. Swipe again to bring the digits page back.Youâ€™ll have access to all these operators: %, 1/x, sin, cos, tan,sin-, cos- tan-,  e, square root, pi, x!, x^2, x^3, x^n, +-Wear Sci Calc is a calculator app for the Android Wear Platform from Fife-V. descriptionHTML:
Do you need more than a simple calculator? Then swipe to the left to get a page full of scientific functions on the Fife-V Wear calculator. Swipe again to bring the digits page back.

You’ll have access to all these operators: %, 1/x, sin, cos, tan,sin-, cos- tan-, e, square root, pi, x!, x^2, x^3, x^n, +-

Wear Sci Calc is a calculator app for the Android Wear Platform from Fife-V.

Check out our survey app Ireckon: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.fifev.irekon
comments: Too inaccurate, it passes the 10/3*3 test but fails 25/9*9. Also, sqrt(6) to the 2nd power does not yield "6" as it is supposed to for a scientific calculator...
Nice calculator It's good to have some more advanced functions that the other calculators I've tried. I really seemed to miss not having +- but this has it.
